short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inline translation tool: translate text without leaving the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overlay Translate provides inline translation.
Select any text, click the icon, and get a word or selection instantly translated, similar to iPhone/Mac's "Lookup" feature.

Features:  
⭐ Inline translation on the page;
⭐ Quick translate in the popup;
⭐ Configure a default translations language.

How to Use:

Language Selection: Access the app's popup by clicking the "puzzle" icon in the toolbar to choose your preferred translation language. English is the default language.
Activation: Select a word or phrase and click the icon to view instant translation.

Disclamer: Translation functionality is powered by Google Translate, a trademark of Google LLC. Please note that this extension is not endorsed, affiliated, or associated with Google or its trademarks.
